name: HepatitisETestsForHepatitisEVirusNucleicAcid
title: Hepatitis E (Tests for hepatitis E virus Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Hepatitis E nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Hepatitis E NAA),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
